para.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules implementing the provisions of § 50-2201.03c, including establishing:
Terms and conditions for a SFD permit;
An application process for obtaining a SFD permit;
A process by which a permit may be revoked if the permitted operator does not comply with the terms and conditions of the SFD permit, § 50-2201.03c, or regulations issued pursuant to this section;
The term for which a SFD permit lasts before requiring renewal;
Penalties and fines for violations of the terms and conditions of the SFD permit, § 50-2201.03c, or regulations issued pursuant to this section;
The number of shared fleet devices each permitted operator may operate in the public right-of-way;
The process a permitted operator shall follow and the criteria a permitted operator shall meet, including an explanation of how each criterion is weighted, in order to increase its fleet size;
Insurance requirements for permitted operators, which:
Shall include liability insurance in an amount not less than $1 million per incident, that each permitted operator shall carry; and
May include a required minimum aggregate amount of liability insurance; and
The amount of the performance bond permitted operators shall provide to operate in the District.
